document.Are you sure you want to delete this doc: Weet u zeker dat u dit document wilt verwijderen?
document.Do you want to start the OCR process for: Wilt u het OCR proces starten voor alle pagina's van dit document?

document-list.Are you sure you want to delete this doc: Weet u zeker dat u dit document en al zijn pagina's wilt verwijderen?

page-list.page-list.Are you sure you want to delet: Weet u zeker dat u deze pagina wilt verwijderen?
page-list.page-list.OCR task has been started for: OCR taak is gestart voor de geselecteerde pagina
page-list.page-list.Translation task has been star: Vertaling taak is gestart voor de geselecteerde pagina
page-list.page-list.Target language cannot be the: Doeltaal kan niet dezelfde zijn als de brontaal
page-list.page-list.Translation is not possible wh: Vertaling is niet mogelijk als er geen overlay beschikbaar is. Upload een overlay of OCR de pagina.
page-list.page-list.No overlay available. Upload a: Geen overlay beschikbaar. Upload eerst een overlay of OCR de pagina.
page-list.page-list.to see translation memory conf: om de configuratie van het vertaalgeheugen te zien.
page-list.page-list.No pages are uploaded yet: Er zijn nog geen pagina's geupload.
page-list.page-list.These buttons have actions on: These buttons have actions on the document level
page-list.page-list.refreshes the states of the do: refreshes the states of the document and its pages
page-list.page-list.starts the layout engine analy: starts the layout engine analysis for all the pages of the document
page-list.page-list.deletes the document with all: deletes the document with all its pages
page-list.page-list.All the pages that you have up: All the pages that you have uploaded will appear here
page-list.page-list.You can scroll down the list i: You can scroll down the list if you have more than two pages
page-list.page-list.Click on a page to view your p: Click on a page to view your page and all its information.

help.Cannot connect to Confluence: Kan geen verbinding maken met Confluence.

tour.Let's take a quick tour on how to use th: Laten we een korte rondleiding houden over hoe de applicatie werkt.
tour.This is a table with all your documents: Dit is een tabel waar al uw beschikbare documenten zichtbaar zijn.
tour.At the first glance, it should look pret: Op het eerste zicht, ziet het er vrij leeg uit
tour.When you created documents, you can alwa: Wanneer u documenten hebt gecreëerd, kunt u er altijd naar navigeren door op de titels te klikken.
tour.The table is paginated, and a search but: Deze tabel is gepagineerd, en met een zoekknop in de navigatiebalk kunt u naar documenten zoeken
tour.By pressing this button you can create a: Door op deze knop te drukken kunt u een nieuw document toevoegen

document-add.A document is a collection of pages/imag: A document is a collection of pages/images
document-add.Here you can fill in a title for your ne: Here you can fill in a title for your new document
document-add.A summary of your document, for your own: A summary of your document, for your own reference
document-add.When you have filled in the information: When you have filled in the information of your document, you can press this button to proceed to the next step.

layout.In this step you can select which model: In this step you can select which model you wish to use for the layout analysis (OCR)
layout.Depending on your documents and the sele: Depending on your documents and the selected engine, the layout analysis results might be different

page-add.button to select images or PDF files tha: button to select images or PDF files that you wish to add to your document.
page-add.All pages in a PDF file will automatical: All pages in a PDF file will automatically be converted to images.
page-add.Documents will automatically be uploaded: Documents will automatically be uploaded once you selected them from your system.
page-add.When you have selected all your pages, y: When you have selected all your pages, you can press this button to proceed to the next step.

page-leaflet.In this interactive view your selected p: In this interactive view your selected page will be presented.
page-leaflet.When the layout analysis has completed,: When the layout analysis has completed, you can see blue boxes around the text in the page.
page-leaflet.By hovering these boxes, a popup will ap: By hovering these boxes, a popup will appear which contains the plain text that has been recognized by the OCR.
page-leaflet.By clicking on these, it will automatica: By clicking on these, it will automatically zoom in to your text.
page-leaflet.You can zoom in or out with your scroll: You can zoom in or out with your scroll wheel, and drag the screen to move in your page.
page-leaflet.You can click on the tabs to change the: You can click on the tabs to change the view and see other kinds of information about your page.
page-leaflet.Text view of your page. Only works after: Text view of your page. Only works after layout analysis.
page-leaflet.Metadata of your page from the document: Metadata of your page from the document classifier.
page-leaflet.History of actions done on your page: History of actions done on your page.
page-leaflet.Switch between the available languages o: Switch between the available languages of your page.
page-leaflet.If the desired language is not present,: If the desired language is not present, use the context menu to translate your page.
